description: Love the taste of butternut squash, but a little bit intimidated by peeling and slicing? You’re not alone! Here is our guide for how to roast, peel, cut, and cook butternut squash, ready to walk you through every step of preparing everyone’s favorite fall and winter veggie!
name: How to Cook Butternut Squash

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Place the butternut squash, whole, on the lined baking sheet and bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes. Remove it from the oven and set aside, until it's cool enough to handle
Cut it in half length-wise. Scoop out the seeds, turn it skin side up, and remove the skin with your hands. Place the flesh in a bowl and set it aside
